description: This file defines API service functions for interacting with backend endpoints related to expenses, categories, and reports in a personal finance tracker application. It includes functions for CRUD operations and report retrieval, utilizing fetch and environment variables for configuration.

methods.name: request
methods.description: Performs an HTTP request with given path and options, handles JSON responses and errors.

methods.name: ExpensesAPI.list
methods.description: Fetches a list of expenses with optional query parameters.

methods.name: ExpensesAPI.create
methods.description: Creates a new expense with provided payload.

methods.name: ExpensesAPI.update
methods.description: Updates an expense identified by id with provided payload.

methods.name: ExpensesAPI.get
methods.description: Retrieves a single expense by id.

methods.name: CategoriesAPI.create
methods.description: Creates a new category with provided payload.

methods.name: CategoriesAPI.update
methods.description: Updates a category by id with provided payload.

methods.name: ReportsAPI.summary
methods.description: Fetches summary totals, optionally filtered by parameters.

methods.name: ReportsAPI.cashflow
methods.description: Retrieves cashflow data for a specified period.

methods.name: ReportsAPI.exportCSV
methods.description: Exports report data as CSV, with optional filters.
